DOC.brief_summary: This research study compare two way biopsy lymph node chest use endobronchial ultrasound-guided transbronchial needle aspiration '' ( EBUS-TNBA ) . During EBUS-TBNA procedure , patient sedate , flexible camera ultrasound probe insert mouth large airway chest , allow u see ( via ultrasound ) biopsy lymph node chest . The purpose research study determine EBUS-TBNA procedure make simpler . In today 's practice , biopsy needle two part , 1 ) needle 2 ) inner stylet run middle needle . Because many biopsy needle ( needle use breast biopsy different type lung biopsy needle ) use inner stylet , investigator think use stylet necessary . If step safely eliminate without decrease effectiveness procedure , could shorten procedure ( save time ) . This study deign formally test hypothesis stylet necessary EBUS-TBNA .
DOC.brief_title: Stylet vs No Stylet During EBUS TBNA
DOC.criteria: All patient > 18 year old capable inform consent refereed EBUSTBNA institution . Standard contraindication EBUS ( coagulopathy , antiplatlet/anticoagulant use , clinical instability ) Pregnant woman
